description: The Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Bunkar Yojana in Arunachal Pradesh provides financial assistance and skill upgradation training to women weavers to enhance their productivity and income in the handloom sector.

benefits.financial_assistance: Up to Rs. 50,000 for equipment and raw materials
benefits.training: Free skill upgradation training for 1-3 months

residency_criteria: Must be a resident of Arunachal Pradesh
occupation_criteria: Must be engaged in handloom weaving

eligible_activities: Purchase of looms or raw materials

steps: Obtain the application form from the District Textile and Handicrafts Office
Submit the application with proof of weaving experience
Attach required documents, including Aadhaar and residency proof
Applications are reviewed by the department
Approved applicants receive assistance and training

special_notes: Priority is given to traditional weavers
Training is conducted at local centers
